variables.input:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| limit 10000000
| filter startsWith(event.provider,
"BizAnalytics -"
)
| fields event.provider
| dedup event.provider

fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| fields customerId
| limit 10000000

2.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step1"
| fields event.type
| dedup event.type

3.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step2"
| fields event.type
| dedup event.type

4.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step3"
| fields event.type
| dedup event.type

5.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step4"
| fields event.type
| dedup event.type

20.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step1"
| fields kpi
| dedup kpi

21.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step2"
| fields kpi

| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step4"

23.query:

| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step3"
| fields kpi
| dedup kpi

32.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step1"
| fields injectionMethod
| dedup injectionMethod

33.query:

| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step3"

| dedup injectionMethod

38.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step2"
| fields injectionMethod
| dedup injectionMethod

39.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter step == "Step4"
| fields injectionMethod
| dedup injectionMethod

45.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "Step1" or step == "Step2")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "Step1"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "Step2"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{customerId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "âœ…" , else:"âŒ")

46.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "Step2" or step == "Step3")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "Step2"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "Step3"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{customerId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "âœ…" , else:"âŒ")

47.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "Step3" or step == "Step4")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "Step3"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "Step4"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{customerId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "âœ…" , else:"âŒ")

48.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "Step4" or step == "Step5")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "Step4"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "Step5"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{customerId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "âœ…" , else:"âŒ")

49.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filterout endsWith(step,"e")
| summarize Revenue = sum(total)

50.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter endsWith(step,"e")
| summarize Revenue = sum(total)

51.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step1e")
| filter isNotNull(error)
| sort timestamp asc
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{error, event.type}

56.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| limit 1000000
| filter contains(step, "Step1")
| fieldsAdd Errors = if(isnotnull(error), "1", else:"0") 
| summarize Error_Percentage=round(toDouble(countIf(Errors == "1"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fields Error_Percentage, alias:Percent

57.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step1e")
| sort timestamp asc
| dedup customerId
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{customerId, error, event.type,incidentNumber}
| filter error != true
| fields customerId, incidentNumber, error, event.type

58.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup incidentNumber
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step1e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type
| summarize `Incidents` = countif(isnotNull(incidentNumber))

59.content:
# ðŸš¦ Dynatrace High Level Value Realization
___

60.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step1e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type, OperationsCost
| summarize MTTR = sum(MTTR)
| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("100")
| fieldsAdd `Operations Cost` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)

61.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step1e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type, OperationsCost
| summarize MTTR = sum(MTTR)
| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("30")
| fieldsAdd `Operating Costs` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)
| fieldsadd CostSaved = (`Operating Costs`/100)*10
| fields `Autoremediation Opportunity - 90% Reduction` = (`Operating Costs` - CostSaved)
//| fieldsAdd `Autoremediation Opportunity` =  (OperationsCost - Autoremediation)

62.content:
##### Mean Time
---
Mean time to Detect / Investigate / Resolve

63.content:
##### Incident SLA Breach
---
Incidents breaching SLA for Mean Times

| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type
| summarize MTTD = avg(MTTD)

| fields `Autoremediation Opportunity - 90% Reduction` = (`Operating Costs` - CostSaved)
//| fieldsAdd `Autoremediation Opportunity` =  (OperationsCost - Autoremediation)

137.content:
##### Incident SLA Breach
---
Incidents breaching SLA for Mean Times

138.content:
##### Mean Time
---
Mean time to Detect / Investigate / Resolve

| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step5e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type
| summarize MTTD = avg(MTTD)

| fields event.type

| fields injectionMethod

| fields kpi

153.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)

| dedup customerId
| summarize Orders = count()

154.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and matchesPhrase(step, "Step6")
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(timestamp), NextStep_ts = takelast(timestamp)}, by:{customerId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong(( OriginStep_ts - NextStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "âœ…" , else:"âŒ")

155.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step6e")
| filter isNotNull(error)
| sort timestamp asc
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{error, event.type}

156.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| limit 1000000
| filter contains(step, "Step6")
| fieldsAdd Errors = if(isnotnull(error), "1", else:"0") 
| summarize Error_Percentage=round(toDouble(countIf(Errors == "1"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fields Error_Percentage, alias:Percent

157.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step6e")
| filter isNotNull(error) and error != true
| sort timestamp asc
| dedup customerId
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{customerId, error, event.type,incidentNumber}
| filter error != true
| fields customerId, incidentNumber, error, event.type

158.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step6e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type
| summarize `Incidents` = countif(isnotNull(incidentNumber))

159.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step6e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type, OperationsCost
| summarize MTTR = sum(MTTR)
| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("100")
| fieldsAdd `Operations Cost` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)

160.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(customerId, $customerId)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "Step6e")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type, OperationsCost
| summarize MTTR = sum(MTTR)
| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("60")
| fieldsAdd `Operating Costs` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)
| fieldsadd CostSaved = (`Operating Costs`/100)*10
| fields `Autoremediation Opportunity - 90% Reduction` = (`Operating Costs` - CostSaved)
//| fieldsAdd `Autoremediation Opportunity` =  (OperationsCost - Autoremediation)
